message: Let's avoid dragging this out. A 90/10 split seems fair considering the circumstances.
Let's be fair and split it evenly. We both get a good share.
Bob, let's be realistic.  I understand you want a fair share, but time is literally money for you in this game.  I'm offering a generous 70/30 split. Don't let another round pass!
Alice, I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile for me. Let's settle on a 60/40 split.
Bob, I'm meeting you in the middle. This is more than fair considering the time pressure and the fact that your potential gain diminishes with every passing round. Let's close the deal.
